_meta.title: forest_a random start-goal six baselines (reachability-screened)
_meta.summary: Evaluate A*, Hybrid A*, RRT*, A*-MPC, Hybrid A*-MPC, and RRT-MPC on forest_a with random start-goal pairs and Hybrid A* reachability screening.
commands: conda run -n ros2py310 python infer.py --profile repro_20260208_forest_a_random_startgoal_6baselines --runs 1 --max-steps 600 --device cpu --no-progress
notes: `--baselines all` expands to: astar, hybrid_astar, rrt_star, astar_mpc, hybrid_astar_mpc, rrt_mpc.
This profile is baseline-only (`skip_rl=true`) for fair planner-vs-planner comparison.
